welcome.label.minimum_requirement: We support Safari version 11 and above.\nChrome version 53 and above for KYC.

create_account.label.can_expore: You can now explore our site!
create_account.label.can_trading: To start trading, we need some \nfurther KYC verifications.
create_account.label.the_test: ( The test will take around 10 minutes )
ekyc_landing.label.subpage_title: First, we need you to Follow these steps
ekyc_landing.label.subpage_desc: To start trading please complete these steps.
ekyc_citizen_select.label.idcard_desc_th: You'll be required to take a photo of \nID card to identify your identity.
ekyc_citizen_select.label.photo_desc_th: Please prepare a space with enough light \nto ensure you can take a photo easily
ekyc_citizen_select.label.personal_desc_: Your personal information and your work \nplace information will be required.
ekyc_citizen_select.label.idcard_desc_fr: Please prepare your valid passport with at \nleast 3 to 6 months of remaining validity.
ekyc_citizen_select.label.photo_desc_fr: Please prepare a space with enough light \nto ensure you can take a photo easily
ekyc_citizen_select.label.personal_desc_: Your personal information and your work \nplace information will be required.
work_permit.label.date_of_birth: Date of Birth ( Day / Month / Year )
work_permit.label.important: Important \n• Passport must have at least 3 months remaining validity. \n• Upload a photo of your work permit document issued by the government agency
work_permit.label.upload_work_permit: Upload a photo of your work permit document
work_permit.label.update_file_support: PDF, JPG, and PNG file supported \nMaximum size %@ MB
work_permit.label.important_non: Important \n• Passport must have at least 6 months remaining validity.
work_permit.label.age_warning_long: Your age is below 20. Please recheck your Date of birth as the law require at least age of 20 to be able to trade.
ekyc_infomation.label.subpage_title: Please make sure the info matches your ID card
ekyc_infomation.label.age_warning_long: Your age is below 20. Please recheck your Date of birth as the law require at least age of 20 to be able to trade.
ekyc_infomation.label.subpage_passport_t: Please make sure the info matches your passport
ndid.label.accept_check: I accept the Terms & Conditions of NDID
ndid.label.bank_subpage_title: Please choose Identity Provider that you have already registered and have a mobile application ready for identity authentication.
ndid.label.registered_section_title: The identity providers that you have already register and ready to use.
ndid.label.bank_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to choose this Identity Provider?
ndid.label.bank_confirm_desc: By clicking confirm, you will be redirected to this provider’s application
ndid.label.deny_title: Are you sure you want to deny NDID terms & conditions?
ndid.label.deny_desc: Should you not accept the terms & conditions, you would not be able to continue your identity verification process.
ndid_waiting.label.subpage_title: Confirm at the mobile application of the identity provider you chose
ndid_waiting.label.subpage_desc: You are verifying your identity for the purpose of Cryptoplat and requiring to submit information from [%@]
ndid_waiting.label.verify_desc: Please Verify your identification at %@ Mobile application within 60 minutes and return to continue your transaction here
ndid_waiting.label.timeout_subpage_title: Sorry, you didn’t finish the \nprocess within the time limit
ndid_waiting.label.timeout_subpage_desc: Please go back and redo the \nprocess to continue
ndid_info.label.subpage_title: Please make sure the info matches your ID card
address_info.placeholder.address_line: Please input Address (House No., Building, Street)
address_info.placeholder.zipcode: Your Zip Code or Postal Code
address_info.label.work_in_thai: work in Thailand and have the address
work_info.placeholder.income: Select a Range of Your Income
additional_info.placeholder.country_inco: Please select Country of Source of Income
recheck_info.label.checkbox: I hereby certify that the information and documents submitted to cryptoplat are correct and true. and I agree Consent includes giving permission to all required conditions.
registered_success.label.desc: The result will be sent to your \nregistered email within 24 hours.
suite_test.label.desc: Next, please complete suitability test. \nYou will not be able to start trading if \nyou do not complete the test.
suite_test.label.estimate_time: ( The test will take around 5 minutes )
knowledge_test.label.desc: You need to pass the test to ensure you fully understand about the potential risk of cryptocurrency. You will not be able to start trading if you do not complete the test.
knowledge_test.label.estimate_time: ( The test will take around 5 - 10 minutes )
knowledge_test.label.success_desc: You have passed Crypto Knowledge test. You can now start trading!
settings.label.allow_marketing_desc: Cryptoplat may share usage data to 3rd party ad platforms to help improve our targeting and marketing quality.
settings.label.marketing_campaigns_info: Margin call and forced liquidation notifications will be sent to you. These notifications cannot be turned off to ensure that you receive them in a timely manner.
ndid_error.label.30000_description: The Identity Provider you choose is currently unavailable. Please retry or select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.30200_description: Sorry, your request cannot be proceeded. Please check your citizen ID and retry or select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.30300_description: Sorry, your information could not be found. Please select another Identity Provider that you have been registered and have a mobile application activated.
ndid_error.label.30400_description: You select Identity Provider (IdP) that your information is not up-to-date. Kindly contact that IdP for update later. You may select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.30500_description: Identity authentication fails due to invalid PIN, or incorrect Selfie Photo. Please retry or select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.30510_description: Identity authentication fails due to Invalid PIN/Password. Please retry or select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.30520_description: Identity authentication fails due to incorrect Face Recognition. Please retry or select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.30530_title: Failed authentication : unregistered device / invalid OTP
ndid_error.label.30530_description: Identity authentication fails due to Invalid OTP. Please retry or select another Identity Provider.
ndid_error.label.30600_description: Authentication fails due to your cancelling your identity authentication at Identity Provider’s Mobile App. Please select another Identity Provider.
ndid_error.label.30610_description: Your identity authentication fails because you do not accept the terms of service of the Identity Provider that you have selected. Please retry or select another Identity Provider.
ndid_error.label.30700_description: Your identity authentication fails due to unavailable Identity Provider at the moment. Please retry and select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.30800_description: You have not registered NDID Service and accepted T&C. Please complete before proceeding the transaction.
ndid_error.label.30900_description: Cannot proceed the requestat the moment due to out of [IdP] service hours. Please select another IdP.
ndid_error.label.40000_description: Sorry, your request cannot be proceeded at the moment. Please try again or contact Call center.
ndid_error.label.40200_description: Sorry, unable to proceed due to incorrect citizen ID number. Please try again.
ndid_error.label.40300_description: Sorry, the request cannot be proceeded. Please contact Call center.
ndid_error.label.40400_description: Sorry, unable to proceed due to incorrect information. Please retry or contact Call center.
ndid_error.label.40500_description: Sorry, the request cannot be proceeded. Please contact Call center.
ndid_error.label.1000_description: We can't process your request at this time. Please try again later.
